name: Witch Race
description:
Choose one of 3 fun little witches and get ready by buying powerups in the store.

Your goal is to collect as much candy as you can while dodging creepy enemies and obstacles without losing your stamina. How far can you get?

Watch out for powerdowns, you could end up getting light as a balloon or heavy as an anvil.

How to Play: Tap the screen to make the little witch go up, dodge obstacles and enemies and collect candies along the way.

Did you know? This game is part of the Totem network of games!
Use your unique Totem Avatars in the game for exclusive features. Don't have an Avatar yet? Get one for free through the Totem Explorer website.

🦇 https://totem-explorer.com/
